function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of infectious diseases and pandemics","Impact":"High risk of widespread illness and mortality","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene practices and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Vaccines, sanitation technology","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health organizations, government"},{"Description":"Transmission of infectious agents","Impact":"Increased spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Improving sanitation, implementing quarantine measures","Technologies":"Sanitation technology, contact tracing apps","People":"General population, travelers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the epidemiologic triangle","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling and preventing infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Education and training on the epidemiologic triangle model","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, educational resources","People":"Health professionals, researchers","Owner":"Health institutions, educational institutions"}]}
